title: Mobile Microlearning for Strengthening Academic and Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental information retrieval skills and college-level academic experience
context.additional_context: Learners assume the role of ordinary citizens, focusing on self-directed learning using mobile devices in a BYOD environment. The goal is to cultivate the ability to utilize information for solving real-life problems.

learning_goals: Learners critically evaluate academic databases and credible online sources to select appropriate materials for research tasks
Learners can apply digital resource management strategies in the era of information overload to efficiently organize information in personal and professional contexts.
Learners can practice proper citation and plagiarism prevention principles in academic writing and explain ethical approaches to information utilization.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
